com.SCHSRobotics.HAL9001.system.gui

Class Cursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SCHSRobotics.HAL9001.system.gui.old.Cursor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigCursor, DefaultCursor

    public abstract class Cursor
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class meant to represent the user's cursor.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0 Creation Date: 7/20/19
    Author:
    Dylan Zueck, Crow Force, Cole Savage, Level Up

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cursor

        public Cursor(int x,
              int y,
              int blinkSpeedMs,
              char cursorIcon)
        Constructor for cursor class.
        Parameters:
        x - The cursor's initial x coordinate.
        y - The cursor's initial y coordinate.
        blinkSpeedMs - The cursor blink speed in milliseconds.
        cursorIcon - The char that will represent the cursor when the menu is drawn.

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Abstract method that runs when the cursor is updated every frame. Methods for controlling the cursor go here.

      • setDoBlink

        public void setDoBlink(boolean doBlink)
        Sets if the cursor should blink or not.
        Parameters:
        doBlink - A boolean specifying whether the cursor should be set to blink (true) or not (false).
